name: requisitionAccepted
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Invoice ID {invoice} has been accepted. Total amount is {amount}.

name: requisitionPaid
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Amount {amount} for the invoice ID {invoice} has been paid by the {buyer}.

name: requisitionOnTheWay
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Requisition of invoice ID {invoice} has been dispatched and currently in transit.

name: requisitionDelivered
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Requisition of invoice ID {invoice} has been delivered successfully.

name: orderAccepted
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Invoice ID {invoice} has been accepted. Total amount is {amount}.

name: orderPaid
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Amount {amount} for the invoice ID {invoice} has been paid by the {buyer}.

name: orderOnTheWay
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Order of invoice ID {invoice} has been dispatched and currently in transit.

name: orderDelivered
format:
Hello {buyer}, 
Order of Invoice ID {invoice} has been delivered successfully.
